survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?
How successful do you think you were at completing the task?
How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of English?
How likely is your partner to be a fluent speaker of Spanish?
How likely do you think it is that your partner is bilingual?
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: friendly
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: smart
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: collaborative
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: honest
Please rate your partner according to the following attributes: funny
How likely do you think it was that you were talking to a chatbot rather than a human?
If you were communicating with a chat bot, would you want them to communicate in both English and Spanish?

chat.msg: hi there! que comience el juego!!
en frente
sure thing! i'm moving forward on the twig
Ahora estoy en una pequeña isla con un tigre. ¿Adónde debo ir ahora?
esquerda
¡vale! voy hacia la izquierda
Well, now I'm with an elephant. Whats Next?
arara
gotcha! headed towards the parrot now
keep going forward
¡lo entendiste! avanzando hacia adelante ahora
be careful of the tiger
thanks for the heads up! i see him, and i'm steering clear
now, where to?
surround him and go straight and pass thje bridge and u will find the map
okey dokey
i'm gonna circle around mr. tiger, cross the bridge and head straight then
did you find the map?
found it! perfect, now where to?
now go back to the parrot
on my way back to the parrot! alright, i'm back to the parrot now
¿que sigue?
cross the rocks until you find a frog
alright, i'm hopping across the rocks now
ok, now i see the frog! what's the next move?
go left and cross the crocodile that is making a bridge for you
aha! good ol' croc bridge. i'm crossing it now
Llegué al otro lado sano y salvo. ¿Qué sigue, amigo?
keep going left and cross the rocks until you find a girafe
got it! hopping left on these rocks then
did u fint eh giraffe?
yes, spoted the giraffe! where to now, buddy?
cros the branch bridge but be careful because theres a snake after it
oh boy, snakes
Está bien, tendré cuidado. cruzándolo ahora
now crouch under the bushes very slowly, after the bushes is the treasure, be careful of the snake
alright, crouching and moving slooowly
can see the treasure now, thanks for the heads up on the snake!
now grab the treasure and make your way back to the treasure map
snatched the treasure, amigo! heading back to the map now *finished*

chat.msg: hey, q tal? empezamos el juego?
where do you want to go?
awesome! okay, see that wooden bench to your left? stroll on over there
then, we're going to do a quick 180 and head back toward our furry friend, the white dog
the one at the picnic table?
nope, the one we started from
Pasarás el banco nuevamente y luego cruzarás el sendero.
now what
alright, head below the second white dog and keep going downwards
see that juicy bowl of berries? go over there
here
righto, now going west from those berries
¿Ves otra rama de madera al otro lado del río? vamos a cruzarlo
here
yes, you've got it
now, let’s scoot around the right side of that green bush. don't touch it
here
¡perfecto! Ahora dirígete a la izquierda y pasa por debajo del puesto de floristería.
here
yes, now just head past the bridge towards the beautiful sunset in the west
keep going!
here
great! hay un par de gente mayor en un banco, ¿lo ves? pasa entre ellos y la rama de madera
here
yes, head south a few steps and then to the east
vayamos entre la rama y el arbusto. ¡sigue adelante!
here
yes, just a few more steps to the east and we are there
good job!
here
yes, and there we have it! we've reached the adorable young deer
¡lo lograste!
finished
yes, you did it, well done! that was some excellent navigating
thanks for playing!
how do i end the game
¡Simplemente diga "juego terminado" y podremos terminarlo! ¡Excelente trabajo, por cierto!
juego terminado
perfecto
¡has hecho un gran trabajo! gracias por jugar. ¿jugamos de nuevo pronto?
no
alright, no worries
Entonces juguemos en otro momento. ¡qué tengas un lindo día!
gracias
¡de nada!
game finished
well done, you did great! thanks for playing
have a great day!
end game
sure thing, game ended
¡Que tengas un día fantástico por delante!
close game
game closed
take care!

chat.msg: hey there, estas listo?
where are u right now?
i'm at the tent at the very top of the map
¿Adónde vamos ahora?
go south and east until u find a big mushroom
cool, i see the rompinompa red mushroom now, next step?
go south until u find a telescope
alright, i've found the blue telescope
where to now, amigo?
go west and climb the rocks and you will reach the house
nice! i climbed the rocks and here's the wooden house
*finalizado*

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
great! head southwest under the first palm tree, then take a right and cross the second palm
ahora, gire totalmente a la izquierda antes de la tercera palma y continúe hacia el sur.
at the dog?
yep, that's the one! go past the puppy, veer a bit to the left, and then swerve back to the right heading south
whats my final destiny?
no spoilers, buddy! next up, you wanna go between the big rock on your left and the small one on your right
eso te llevará a un poco de agua
here
that's right! now wade in the water until you see a big red crab, then take a hard right
you'll be following the big rock on your left
here
perfect! keep going west in the water until you reach a medium rock
Ten cuidado con el tiburón y gira rápidamente a la derecha cuando lo veas.
here
yes, pal! now, head back to the shore, squeeze between that medium rock and the tricolored ball, and keep moving north
here
right on! now veer a bit to the left and head northwest
Verás una carpa roja a tu izquierda y un gran altavoz a tu derecha. ir entre ellos
here
bingo! now, circle around the red tent in a smooth arc
here
nice! now, head south but stop just at the shore
No entres al agua esta vez. Gira a la derecha y dirígete hacia el oeste debajo del kayak rojo.
here
yep, now take a sharp 90 degree turn right, walk alongside the kayak heading north until you hit a small green bush

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.

When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
